name: project-guardian-mcp
description: Project Guardian MCP - A focused Model Context Protocol server for project memory management and workflow guardianship with knowledge graph capabilities

scripts.build:prod: mkdir -p .tmp && cp package.prod.json .tmp/package.json && cd .tmp && npm install --production && cd .. && npx esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --minify --platform=node --target=node18 --outfile=dist/index.js --external:@modelcontextprotocol/sdk --external:sqlite3 --external:zod && rm -rf .tmp
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build:prod

author: 1999AZZAR
